snippet.title: Run Die Run Again (RDRA) - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Run Die Run Again (RDRA) is a fast-paced first-person precision-platformer, where every inch of the environment is out to kill you! A speed-running, trial and error endurance contest, where fast reactions and acrobatic dodging skills are rewarded. 

First-person | Survival | Platformer

Site: https://www.retroninja.com/
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1416900/Run_Die_Run_Again_RDRA/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/RetroNinja5
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RetroNinjaGames
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/twitchfactor
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/retroninjagames/
